The following application uses the API to fetch data, initially to populate the drop-down list of projects and on-the-fly to populate the table of vehicles based on the project selected by the user. See the [app.R](https://github.com/CALSTART/calstartdata.org/blob/master/app_tbl/app.R) Shiny code.
